author: Special Correspondent
text:
In the second round of the pulse polio immunisation programme organised by the State government on Sunday, as many as 6,68,0230 children below the age of five were vaccinated, achieving coverage of around 95.43 per cent.

A total of 43,051 booths were set up in all Primary Health Centres, government hospitals, Integrated Child Development Services centres and noon meal centres besides schools. As many as 1,652 transit booths were set up in bus termini and railway stations, toll plazas and the airport.
title: 95 p.c. coverage in second round of pulse polio programme
